DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluate Clinical Efficacy Safety Bio Mineral Toothpaste Patients With Mild Periodontitis
DOC.detailed_description: This study Single blind , Randomized , Active-controlled Comparative clinical trial evaluate clinical efficacy safety follow application 4 week Bio Mineral toothpaste patient mild periodontitis . 30 patient treatment group 30 patient control group , total 60 patient enrol study . Every patient use investigational toothpaste 2 time everyday 4 week brush teeth least 3 minute time 1ml toothpaste .
DOC.criteria: 1 . A healthy man menopausal woman least 18 maximum 63 year age . 2 . Agreed participate voluntarily study . 3 . Must 20 maxillary teeth 4 . Must mild periodontal disease induce mild plaque . 5 . Having general disease except dental disease . 6 . Must able understand carry trial 's objective method . 1. Who history use antimicrobial antibiotic past 30 day . 2. Who history periodontal treatment past 30 day . 3. Who acute pain severe suppuration cause pericoronitis wisdom tooth . 4. Who hypersensitive condition cause Gingivitis periodontitis . 5. Who restorative dentistry wear brace widely . 6. Who use tobacco product ( Except quit smoking ) 7. Who participate clinical trial past 4 week . 8. Who judge inappropriate participate study investigator
